description: Looking for a body wash for men that‚Äôs designed for an active lifestyle? Add Dove Men+Care SportCare Power+Renew Body and Face Wash to your men‚Äôs skin care and shower routine! Dove Men+Care SportCare Power+Renew Body and Face Wash uses its unique MicroMoisture Technology that activates as you lather the lightweight gel to help hydrate skin and protect it against dryness. Sweat, friction from exercise, extra showers, and towel drying make your skin vulnerable and could lead to sweat rash, chaffing, and irritation. Our Power+Renew body wash for men is developed specifically for men who give it their all at work, at the gym, and beyond. It‚Äôs also just as effective for cleansing hands.
